Summary: An inverted teardrop shape with alternating black and white as though rotating.
divs: sighting detailsi was driving to work at approximately 8:00am on m-14 west between us-23 and i-94. i noticed to object in the distance about on my right at appoximately my 2 o'clock. i cannot say what the distance to the object was but it appeared to be at a distance of 1\2-1 miles. the altitude appeared to be around 500ft. the object looked like a black and white top spinning and stationary. my attention was diverted for a moment and i lost the object. approximately 30 seconds later, the object appeared on my left at approximately the same altitude but now nearly directly overhead. what struck me as odd was the nearly immediate change in position. it would have to have had an extremely high velocity to change its position that quickly but i observed no horizontal velocity. i was on the phone with my wife at the time and described the events and object to her. i lost sight of the object in the treeline as i continued down m-14.
trends: There have been 18 other sightings in Ann Arbor
There were no other sightings in Ann Arbor on or around March 15th 2005
